Sure! Here are the disease entities mentioned in the paragraph:

2. ARF (Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome)

2. ARF (Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome) (a serious and potentially life-threatening condition characterized by inflammation and injury in the lungs)
3. Gentamicin (an antibiotic that can cause ARF as a side effect)
